title: Smoked Salmon Pasta with Whisky Reduction
ingredients: ['450g dry penne pasta', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 medium onion, finely chopped', '475ml fish stock', '475ml white wine', '3 tablespoons Scotch whisky', '225g smoked salmon, chopped', '475ml double cream', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste', '40g Parmesan cheese, grated for topping', '1 bunch Italian flat leaf parsley, chopped']
